prompts.frontCover:
A humorous, lighthearted watercolor illustration for a birthday card. The scene depicts cartoon versions of the couple from the reference photo, Lao Lao and Jordan, sitting side-by-side in a ridiculously small, wobbly wooden roller coaster cart, as if on a cheap amusement park ride. Their heads are comically oversized for their bodies.

Jordan, a young East Asian man with tousled, spiky dark hair and a wide, beaming smile, is holding onto the safety bar with a look of pure, carefree joy. He wears a simple white t-shirt.

Beside him, Lao Lao, a young East Asian woman with long, straight dark brown hair and thin, gold-rimmed glasses, has a slightly more apprehensive but still happy expression, clinging to the bar with both hands. She wears a yellow halter top with a small pink floral pattern.

The background is a soft, abstract wash of bright colors suggesting a festive, chaotic amusement park, with blurred light streaks and confetti shapes. The entire illustration is in a flat 2D watercolor style, with visible paper texture, soft color bleeds, and delicate ink outlines.

Centered in the space between and slightly above their heads, the text is written in a beautiful, flowing, handwritten cursive script. The text reads: "Happy Birthday to my favorite rollercoaster partner!"

- Reference photos provided for character creation
- Characters should only appear on the front cover
- Transform real people into artistic cartoon/illustrated versions matching the style
- Maintain recognizable features while adapting to the artistic style
prompts.backCover: A minimalist and elegant back cover for a greeting card. The background is a plain, off-white with a visible watercolor paper texture. In the upper-left corner, there is a very small, delicate abstract splash of watercolor paint, using a soft yellow and pale pink, evoking the color palette of the front cover. The design is sparse and clean, leaving the bottom-right area completely empty for a QR code. The style is flat 2D, with soft color bleeds and an organic feel.
prompts.leftInterior: A subtle and artistic background for the left interior of a greeting card. The entire panel is a soft, abstract watercolor wash using a festive palette of pastel yellow, pink, and light blue, reminiscent of a blurred amusement park sky. The colors blend seamlessly with organic bleeds and visible paper texture. Scattered sparsely across the top and bottom are delicate, confetti-like shapes and light streaks, painted in the same soft watercolor style. The overall composition is decorative but not overpowering, with no text or central focal point. The style is a flat 2D watercolor painting.
prompts.rightInterior:
A minimal and elegant design for the right interior of a greeting card, intended to frame a handwritten message. The background is a clean, off-white watercolor paper texture. A single, delicate watercolor swoosh, mimicking a gentle rollercoaster track, arcs gracefully from the top-left corner down towards the bottom-right. The swoosh uses soft pastel yellow and pink tones. This decorative element is confined to the corners, leaving the central area clear and open for text. The style is a flat 2D watercolor painting with artistic brush strokes and soft colors.

Display this exact text in elegant, clearly readable handwritten script: "To my favorite person, Lao Lao,

Happy Birthday! You're aging like a fine wine, whereas I'm aging like milk. Thanks for not leaving me out on the counter. I'm so glad I get to spend another year with you, even if it means I have to share my snacks.

With all my love,
Jordan"

progress: Generating all card images in parallel...
